abstract: Army begins accepting claims for damage caused by blimp that broke free from base in Maryland and floated over Pennsylvania, damaging power lines.
lead_paragraph: The Army has begun taking claims for damage caused by a wayward blimp that broke loose in Maryland and came to rest in the Pennsylvania countryside.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Damage Claims Over Wayward Blimp
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Damage Claims Over Wayward Blimp

snippet: The Army has begun taking claims for damage caused by a wayward blimp that broke loose in Maryland and came to rest in the Pennsylvania countryside.
